participant_1.name: Jake
participant_1.personality: Outgoing and passionate about music. Always eager to share his knowledge and experiences with others.
participant_1.background: I wake up early and greet my family with a wagging tail. I love going fishing. I play the bass guitar because it is a good instrument for someone who is well built and tall. I recently started working online. I like to watch tv.

participant_2.name: Emily
participant_2.personality: Creative and nurturing, she finds joy in her work and loves to help others express themselves.
participant_2.background: I love listening to music while I work in my flower shop, it helps me get in the zone. I am currently listening to Bach. I just finished helping my student pick out an outfit for a school event. I started working for myself so I could be more flexible with my time and still be able to take care of my toddler. Currently, I am saving up to get some procedures done.

content.text: I'm well, thanks for asking! How about you?
I'm good too! What do you do for a living?
I'm a self-employed florist. I love it! I get to work with flowers all day, and I have a lot of flexibility with my time.
That's awesome! I used to work in a flower shop when I was in high school. It was a lot of fun, but I don't think I could do it full-time.
Yeah, it can be a lot of work, but it's so rewarding! I love seeing my customers' faces when they see the flowers I've put together for them.
I bet! I love flowers too. I'm actually a musician. I play the bass guitar.
Oh, cool! I love music! What kind of music do you play?
I play all sorts of music, but I mostly play rock and blues. I've been playing for about 10 years now.
Wow! That's awesome! I wish I could play an instrument.
It's never too late to learn!
I know, I know. I've been meaning to take lessons for a while now.
I will! Thanks for the encouragement!
